about_the_game:
Listen to the original soundtrack composed by João Matheus Nascimento exclusively for Pulling No Punches!

The Original Soundtrack contains the songs for the levels, menus and cutscenes of the game, as well as background tracks for the teasers and trailers. These are 35 tracks mostly in 8-bits style, with elements of heavy metal and Brazilian funk (sometimes all at once), but also with some instances of techno and neoclassical music.

name: Pulling No Punches Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 203 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1500 MB available space
